ygData.subject: Re: [EQ_Tinkering] gem cutter
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I believe that this rumor was proven false. Unless, of course, YOU PERSONALLY (not a friend, not a high-level guy in your guild, but YOU) have done this.
ygData.messageBody:
On Sat, Aug 26, 2000 at 12:03:54PM -0400, pf1701d@... wrote:
> This is a great tool for all those jewelry makers out there. It will increase
> the quality of gems which in turn will reduce the chance of failure when
> using these "upgraded" gems. All you have to do is pick up a gem, and then
> right click on the gemcutter, you will be returned with a high quality gem.

I believe that this rumor was proven false.

Unless, of course, YOU PERSONALLY (not a friend, not a high-level guy in
your guild, but YOU) have done this.

Pasketti of Povar
